featured.text: According to certain documents, ancient Egyptians also used onions for medicinal purposes, but they likely would have viewed the 35 power of the vegetable as magical, rather than medical.
Today, his forest is home to 1,500 medicinal plants, 2,000 varieties of trees, rare birds, animals, and insects.
There is evidence of onions being used for culinary and medicinal purposes all over the ancient world.

definition.zh_def: 具有治療或改善健康的特性。
definition.en_def: Having properties that are beneficial for healing or improving health.
definition.example: The herbal tea has medicinal qualities that can help soothe a sore throat.
